snippet.title: Because We're Here - Trailer
snippet.description:
Because We're Here ~Mohnblume und Blauerose~ is a bittersweet WW1-era otome visual novel.

Steam: http://tinyurl.com/bwh1sm
Itch.io: http://tinyurl.com/bwh1it 

Devlog: http://www.becausewerehere.tumblr.com

~~~~
Trailer by ArcDawn!
Music - Musopen Symphony Orchestra - Bedřich Smetana's 'Má Vlast - Vltava (The Moldau)'
